attributes.action: Petition for Recognition - Ross Kemp in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a simple pettion dedicated to get some form of recognition for Ross Kemp's work in Afghanistan.

Ross Kemp and his crew through their work, (which I believe they may not fully realise yet) is bringing the Military story into the public eye and identifying some of the hardships that only true professional soldiers could overcome and operate with, during conflicts.

Ross and his crew have given an insight and an understanding to everyone, especially Military partners and they have broken down the barriers (which I don't think they truley are appreciated for) that have hindered communication and contributed to stress within relationships in Military relationships.

Please help to support this cause.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
